summary: A test suite that runs integration checks for Gemma language models of different sizes and precision configurations, confirming that each variant (e.g., 2B and 7B models with 4â€‘bit, bf16, fp16, fp32, eager, flash attention, static cache, and SDPA modes) executes without errors.
